title: I can't download LOL from the download page (MAC)
body: I had a problem with login into LOL client yesterday. I decided to redownload LOL from the download page but it showed up The webpage is not available. I have tried many times since yesterday but still have same problem. Can someone please help?

replies.body: Have you tried a different browser?
Yes I did. I tried both chrome and safari. Neither of them work.....

Then that means you probably going to have a hard time.  Other people have been getting this problem and no many have found a solution yet.

One thing you can try is changing your DNS.
Changing to Public DNS

        Open System Preferences
        Open the Network preference pane
        Select the active connection on the left, and click the "Advanced..." button in the lower right hand corner
        Click "DNS" from the selection bar.
        Remove any current DNS entries, and input the following public DNS servers:

    8.8.8.8
    8.8.4.4

    Save your changes by selecting "OK"
    Apply the changes by clicking "Apply" in the lower right hand corner
